Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Garfield and 95th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
